description: A funny mix-up about dogs whistling.
title: Dog Whistle Confusion
n_1: Dad wonders if their baby can hear a dog whistle.
c1_1: Can our baby hear a dog whistle?
n_2: Dad explains his curiosity about high frequencies.
n_3: Mom thinks about it for a moment.
c1_3: So, can our baby hear it?
n_4: They both laugh at the realization.
